column1: Laiyang city (simplified Chinese: 莱阳; traditional Chinese: 萊陽; pinyin: Láiyáng) is a county-level city within Yantai bordering Qingdao
column2: located in the middle of the Shandong Peninsula
column4: China. The majority (70%) of its population are farmers and it is famous for producing the Laiyang pear. As of 2010
